carts-delete.title: Delete confirmation
carts-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected Carts?

cart-save.title: Save changes
cart-save.message: The cart has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

EnableDeleteObsoleteCarts.title: Enable hard delete for previously soft deleted carts
EnableDeleteObsoleteCarts.description: Periodically delete obsolete carts from the database

PortionDeleteObsoleteCarts.title: How many carts should be deleted per one transaction
PortionDeleteObsoleteCarts.description: The delete carts job do removal by portions, this is the size of one. Big values cause database to slow.

MaximumCountPerDeleteObsoleteCartsJobExe.title: How many carts should be deleted per one job execution
MaximumCountPerDeleteObsoleteCartsJobExe.description: The maximum number of carts that will be deleted in one job run. The higher the number, the longer the job takes.

CronDeleteObsoleteCarts.title: Cron expression for cart hard delete job
CronDeleteObsoleteCarts.description: When carts removal job should start

HardDeleteDelayDays.title: Time to live for soft deleted carts (days)
HardDeleteDelayDays.description: Job deletes carts that were marked to remove more than this number of days ago

Enable.title: Enable notifications about abandoned carts
Enable.description: Remind customers by email about the items abandoned in the cart

CronExpression.title: Cron expression for periodic notification sending
CronExpression.description: When to start sending notifications about the abandoned carts

HoursUntilCartAbandoned.title: Number of hours after which the cart is considered abandoned
HoursUntilCartAbandoned.description: The cart is considered abandoned after the specified number of hours if it has not been cleared or purchased during this time

AbandonedCartEmailNotification.description: The customer will receive an email notification about the items abandoned in the cart.
